subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Finch led the Memphis State basketball team to the 1973 N.C.A.A. title game and coached his alma mater for 11 years.
snippet: Mr. Finch led the Memphis State basketball team to the 1973 N.C.A.A. title game and coached his alma mater for 11 years.
